thread.title: Are you ready for the Volkswagen T-Roc? (It's coming in 2019.)
thread.title_full: Are you ready for the Volkswagen T-Roc? (It's coming in 2019.)

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Are you ready for the Volkswagen T-Roc? (It's coming in 2019.)
text: Way back in 2014 at the Geneva Motor Show, Volkswagen debuted the cute but curious VW T-Roc crossover concept. This summer, a production version of the T-Roc will roll into European showrooms, and the automaker has confirmed that it'll come to the U.S. in 2019. When it, does, VW will have at least four crossovers to offer American shoppers, who've...
